And is NovaPunch back up yet?
Nova punch has been up unless I missed something.
So, what mods are needed for the mosquito?

I'm actually still sorting out the packs needed.

Right now, you will need stock (of course) Tiberdyne's NovaPunch pack, JAWRD missiles, dumb bomb, and I think that might be it.

I'll attach the craft files and then see what you guys are missing. Haven't made my planes open source in a while :0

EDIT: Also damned robotics/aerospace parts

EDITEDIT: Uploaded 5 .craft files. Enjoy!
